stix:STIX_Header.stix:Title: Malicious “Important!” Themed Email
stix:STIX_Header.stix:Description: On September 9, 2016, a trusted third-party reported a phishing email with theme of “Important!”. This activity was observed in the retail sector.

marking:Marking_Structure.TOUMarking:Terms_Of_Use: This Indicator Bulletin is provided "as is" for informational purposes only. The Department of Homeland Security (DHS) does not provide any warranties of any kind regarding any information contained within. The DHS does not endorse any commercial product or service, referenced in this bulletin or otherwise. This document is marked TLP: GREEN. Recipients may only share TLP: GREEN information with peers and partner organizations within their sector or community, but not via publicly accessible channels.For more information on the Traffic Light Protocol, see http://www.us-cert.gov/tlp .

stix:Indicator.indicator:Title: Malicious E-mail Indicator
stix:Indicator.indicator:Description:
This email message reported by a trusted third party is associated with malicious activity.
----- BEGIN EMAIL BODY ----
From: [REDACTED][mailto:gmackey@sjcfl.us] Sent: Friday, September 9, 2016 11:40 AM Subject: Important!
Notice from IT Help Desk, we're updating all staff and student mailbox from 500MB to 50GB. Kindly click HERE for re-validation and increase of MAILBOX QUOTA.
IT HELP DESK.
---- END EMAIL BODY ----

stix:Indicator.indicator:Title: Malicious URL Indicator
stix:Indicator.indicator:Description: This is the underlying URL of the hyperlink in the email body associated with the anchor text ("Kindly click HERE for re-validation and increase of MAILBOX QUOTA.")
